remarks: The product metric is an extended metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
statement:
prdsdsf.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ ( x e. I |-> R ) ) $.
prdsdsf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsdsf.v $e |- V = ( Base ` R ) $.
prdsdsf.e $e |- E = ( ( dist ` R ) |` ( V X. V ) ) $.
prdsdsf.d $e |- D = ( dist ` Y ) $.
prdsdsf.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. W ) $.
prdsdsf.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. X ) $.
prdsdsf.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> R e. Z ) $.
prdsdsf.m $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> E e. ( *Met ` V ) ) $.
prdsxmetlem $p |- ( ph -> D e. ( *Met ` B ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
$d I x $.
$d ph x $.
